title: AI in the Command Line
excerpt: Discover the power of running AI directly in your terminal, from training models to utilizing custom agents like The Claude CLI.
author: Codem
content:
CLI

Did you know you can use ai in the terminal. Cool right.

There are a whole bunch of cool stuff u can do related to training models and even modifying context through markdown files.

My Personal Favorite

My personal fav is The Claude CLI allowing you to make custom agents and link them together.

If you wanna know more go check out network chucks video on it. Trust me its CRAZY Link: Network Chuck Video
